screens.title: Stitch UI - PPT封面
screens.dsl:
[HERO: main]
  { Align: "Center" }
  [BADGE: tag]
    CONTENT: "Stitch UI Engine"
  [HEADING: title1]
    ATTR: Size("XL")
    CONTENT: "JSON Schema 驱动的"
  [HEADING: title2]
    ATTR: Size("XL")
    CONTENT: "下一代 UI 渲染引擎"
  [TEXT: desc]
    CONTENT: "一套 Schema，多端渲染。支持 React 实时预览、LiveView 服务端运行、静态 HTML 导出。"
  [GRID: features]
    { Columns: "3", Gap: "LG" }
    [CARD: f1]
      ATTR: Title("组件化"), Icon("Layers")
      CONTENT: "50+ 预置组件"
    [CARD: f2]
      ATTR: Title("响应式"), Icon("Smartphone")
      CONTENT: "多端自适应"
    [CARD: f3]
      ATTR: Title("AI 友好"), Icon("Zap")
      CONTENT: "智能组装"
  [FLEX: buttons]
    { Gap: "MD", Justify: "Center" }
    [BUTTON: start]
      ATTR: Variant("default"), Size("LG")
      CONTENT: "开始使用"
    [BUTTON: docs]
      ATTR: Variant("outline"), Size("LG")
      CONTENT: "查看文档"

screens.title: 后台管理 - 仪表盘
screens.dsl:
[FLEX: layout]
  { Direction: "Row", Gap: "None" }

  [SIDEBAR: sidebar]
    [HEADING: logo]
      CONTENT: "Admin"
    [NAV: menu]
      [FLEX: nav1]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i1] ATTR: Icon("LayoutDashboard")
        [TEXT: t1] CONTENT: "仪表盘"
      [FLEX: nav2]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i2] ATTR: Icon("Users")
        [TEXT: t2] CONTENT: "用户管理"
      [FLEX: nav3]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i3] ATTR: Icon("Settings")
        [TEXT: t3] CONTENT: "系统设置"

  [SECTION: main]
    [HEADER: topbar]
      { Justify: "Between", Align: "Center" }
      [HEADING: title] CONTENT: "仪表盘概览"
      [FLEX: actions]
        { Gap: "SM" }
        [BUTTON: refresh] ATTR: Variant("outline"), Icon("RefreshCw") CONTENT: "刷新"
        [BUTTON: add] ATTR: Icon("Plus") CONTENT: "新增"

    [GRID: stats]
      { Columns: "4", Gap: "LG" }
      [STATISTIC_CARD: s1]
        ATTR: Title("总用户"), Icon("Users")
        CONTENT: "12,345"
      [STATISTIC_CARD: s2]
        ATTR: Title("活跃用户"), Icon("Activity")
        CONTENT: "8,901"
      [STATISTIC_CARD: s3]
        ATTR: Title("新增用户"), Icon("UserPlus")
        CONTENT: "+234"
      [STATISTIC_CARD: s4]
        ATTR: Title("转化率"), Icon("TrendingUp")
        CONTENT: "12.5%"

    [GRID: content]
      { Columns: "2", Gap: "LG" }
      [CARD: chart]
        ATTR: Title("趋势图表")
        [TEXT: placeholder]
          CONTENT: "图表区域"
      [CARD: recent]
        ATTR: Title("最近活动")
        [LIST: activities]
          [TEXT: a1] CONTENT: "用户 A 完成注册"
          [TEXT: a2] CONTENT: "用户 B 更新资料"
          [TEXT: a3] CONTENT: "用户 C 提交订单"

screens.title: 技术路线图
screens.dsl:
[PAGE: main]
  [SECTION: header]
    { Align: "Center" }
    [BADGE: phase] CONTENT: "2024 Roadmap"
    [HEADING: title]
      ATTR: Size("XL")
      CONTENT: "技术演进路线图"
    [TEXT: subtitle]
      CONTENT: "从 MVP 到生产级产品的完整规划"

  [SECTION: timeline]
    [TIMELINE: phases]
      [CARD: q1]
        ATTR: Title("Q1 - 基础架构"), Icon("Box")
        [LIST: items]
          [TEXT: i1] CONTENT: "核心组件库开发"
          [TEXT: i2] CONTENT: "JSON Schema 规范"
          [TEXT: i3] CONTENT: "基础渲染引擎"
      [CARD: q2]
        ATTR: Title("Q2 - 多端支持"), Icon("Smartphone")
        [LIST: items]
          [TEXT: i1] CONTENT: "React 渲染器"
          [TEXT: i2] CONTENT: "LiveView 适配"
          [TEXT: i3] CONTENT: "静态导出工具"
      [CARD: q3]
        ATTR: Title("Q3 - AI 集成"), Icon("Zap")
        [LIST: items]
          [TEXT: i1] CONTENT: "DSL 编译器"
          [TEXT: i2] CONTENT: "视觉 Token 引擎"
          [TEXT: i3] CONTENT: "Claude 技能集成"
      [CARD: q4]
        ATTR: Title("Q4 - 生态完善"), Icon("Globe")
        [LIST: items]
          [TEXT: i1] CONTENT: "插件系统"
          [TEXT: i2] CONTENT: "模板市场"
          [TEXT: i3] CONTENT: "社区建设"
